channel.title: Delta - Skulls and wilderness level
channel.description:
Ok, i can't find it anywhere =\.
I need to know how to make it so when you attack a person in the wilderness, a skull appears overhead, not the mage/range pray icon.
Also, I don't know how to make the wilderness level appear in the bottom right hand corner of the screen.

item.title: Delta - Skulls and wilderness level
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“pure ess ftw, post:2, topic:269422”][quote author=adamhelloman8 link=topic=355548.msg2721256#msg2721256 date=1238011013]
I need to know how to make it so when you attack a person in the wilderness, a skull appears overhead, not the mage/range pray icon.
[/quote]
this part is NOT located in ANY server files, its in your client.[/quote]
Part of it has to be server sided.

Read full topic
